ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.heaume_t: The creatures of the abyss know no death! Only a full set of armor can unleash the power of the heaume...
Prevents death when taking fatal damage and reduces your strength by <1> for <2> afterward. Cooldown <CD1>.
ability.aquamirae.abyssal_armor.tiara_ti: The radiance of the abyss will swallow all the light! Only a full set of armor can unleash the power of the tiara...

Blinds nearby creatures, reducing their movement speed by <1>. 

 {WHITE}Passive:{GRAY} When attacked, releases a burst of energy, dealing <2> damage to all nearby creatures. Cooldown <CD1>.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed: Attacked villagers have a <1> chance of dropping 1-3 emeralds.
ability.aquamirae.dagger_of_greed_tier_2: Attacked villagers have a <1> chance of dropping 1-3 emeralds. Otherwise, the villager will drop a random stock item.
ability.aquamirae.divider: Reduces the target's max health by <1> for <2>. Stacks up to <3> times.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_1:
This enchanted pouch promises treasure, but only those who dare to accept its challenge will be able to reveal its true contents.

{WHITE}When Activated:{GRAY} Reveals its contents and is consumed.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_2:
The pouch gives you more precious treasures. You have managed to move forward, but there are still challenges ahead of you.

{WHITE}When Activated:{GRAY} Reveals its contents and is consumed.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_3:
Your efforts have unlocked treasures more valuable than you expected. You only have a little time left and you will reach your final goal.

{WHITE}When Activated:{GRAY} Reveals its contents and is consumed.
ability.aquamirae.enchanted_pouch_tier_4:
You have reached the top! The enchanted pouch reveals its true contents. Your patience and courage have paid off, and now you can enjoy your well-deserved reward.

{WHITE}When Activated:{GRAY} Reveals its contents and is consumed.
ability.aquamirae.fin_cutter: Deals <1> more damage for each empty heart you have (max <2>).
ability.aquamirae.remnants_saber: While in water, damage increases by <1>.
ability.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: Summons a storm chakram that accompanies you and deals <1> melee damage. Each instance of damage depletes <2> rune charges.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor: Inflicts poison on enemies for <1> when attacked.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_armor_tier_4: Inflicts poison on enemies for <1> when attacked. Also, taking damage in water boosts your swimming speed by <2> for <3>.
ability.aquamirae.terrible_sword: Has a 50% chance of causing double damage. If the hit isn't fatal, you have a <1> chance of taking <2> magic damage.
ability.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor_tier_: Only a full set of armor will allow you to descend to the bottom of the Ice Maze.

While underwater, it provides oxygen and prevents freezing. The weight of the suit will pull you down.

Press {KEY_ARMOR_BONUS} to release 10 oxygen and temporarily increase your mobility and reduce weight.
ability.aquamirae.whisper_of_the_abyss: Reduces the target's armor by <1> for <2>. Stacks up to <3> times.
ability_goal.aquamirae.apply_effect: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> times the effect was applied
ability_goal.aquamirae.defeat_monsters_l: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> monsters defeated with 3 or fewer hearts
ability_goal.aquamirae.three_bolt_armor: <PROGRESS> of <AMOUNT> Three Bolt Armor pieces equipped

advancements.aquamirae.obtain_shell_horn: Find an important item while exploring frozen ships

effect.aquamirae.abyss_blindness.desc: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Decreases movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.abyss_blindness.descrip: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Decreases movement speed.
effect.aquamirae.crystallization.desc: Blinding Abyss armor effect. You deal 80% less damage and die when the effect ends.
effect.aquamirae.crystallization.descrip: Blinding Abyss armor effect. You deal 80% less damage and die when the effect ends.
effect.aquamirae.strong_armor.desc: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Increases armor value.
effect.aquamirae.strong_armor.descriptio: Blinding Abyss armor effect. Increases armor value.

info.captain_spawn: §d Ghost of Captain Cornelia was awakened!
info.maze_mother_spawn: §c You feel the vibrations under the ice...
item.aquamirae.maze_mother_spawn_egg: Mother of the Maze Spawn Egg
lore.aquamirae.frozen_key: Opens a chest hidden in the depths of the Ice Maze.
lore.aquamirae.golden_moth_in_a_jar: Some treasures can have their own souls, not only devour others...
lore.aquamirae.liquid_curse: Hover over another item and right-click to suppress the {RED}Dead {RED}Sea {RED}Curse {GRAY}on it. Consumed.
lore.aquamirae.luminescent_bubble: Increases the swimming speed of nearby players. Place afloat to build underwater roads.
lore.aquamirae.pirate_pouch: {I}Press {U} to open. > Forgotten pirate clothes that smell like rotten oysters...
lore.aquamirae.poseidons_breakfast: Food of the Sea Gods. > §9Fury X (3:00) > §9Rush V (3:00) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+100% Ability Power > §9+50% Cooldown Reduction
lore.aquamirae.rune_of_the_storm: {I}Press {U} to use. > Attaches to the sword in your off hand, increasing its damage in cold biomes by 33%.
lore.aquamirae.sea_casserole: Is it looking at me? > §9Rush II (1:30) > §9Strength (0:30) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+20% Cooldown Reduction > §9+3 Attack Damage
lore.aquamirae.sea_stew: The power of the sea in your stomach! > §9Fury III (2:00) > §9Strength (2:00) > > §5When Consumed: > §9+30% Ability Power > §9+3 Attack Damage
lore.aquamirae.shell_horn: {B}§dSummons Captain Cornelia. > Can be used near water in an Ice Maze.
lore.aquamirae.ship_graveyard_echo: If you listen carefully, you can hear the horns of hundreds of ships lost in the Ice Maze...
lore.aquamirae.treasure_pouch: {I}Press {U} to open. > Once valuable loot, now worthless trinkets under the ice... May contain a Ship or Outpost map.
lore.aquamirae.wisteria_niveis: Even in the midst of an icy wasteland, a wonderful life can appear. Can be placed.
lore.aquamirae.ship_graveyard_ring: When equipped, you have a 40% chance to ignore {DARK_AQUA}Hydrophobia{GRAY}. The bonus is cumulative.
lore.aquamirae.dead_sea_ring: When equipped, creatures can't inflict {RED}Dead {RED}Sea {RED}Curse {GRAY}upon you.
lore.aquamirae.shoe_spikes: When equipped, increases friction with slippery blocks.
toast.aquamirae.curse.title: Your item was cursed!
